contents:
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3074714/

The first cases of the new pandemic influenza A H1N1 2009 infections were identified in April 2009 in the United States.1 By August 2009, the cumulative number of infections in the United States alone was estimated to be at least 1 million.13 However, there were only 556 confirmed deaths,14 i.e. the mortality rate was only 0.056%.

美国2009 H1N1 百万人感染， 555例死亡， 致死率0.056%

党国用这么容易核实的数字扯蛋，看来真的急眼了
